  • CommonRedisCache
    • key_expire

    • __init__
   1 from __future__ import absolute_import
   2 
   3 from sentry.utils import json
   4 from sentry.utils.redis import get_cluster_from_options, redis_clusters
   5 
   6 from .base import BaseCache
   7 
   8 
   9 class ValueTooLarge(Exception):
  10     pass
  11 
  12 
  13 class CommonRedisCache(BaseCache):
  14     key_expire = 60 * 60  # 1 hour
  15     max_size = 50 * 1024 * 1024  # 50MB
  16 
  17     def __init__(self, client, **options):
  18         self.client = client
  19         BaseCache.__init__(self, **options)
  20 
  21     def set(self, key, value, timeout, version=None, raw=False):
  22         key = self.make_key(key, version=version)
  23         v = json.dumps(value) if not raw else value
  24         if len(v) > self.max_size:
  25             raise ValueTooLarge("Cache key too large: %r %r" % (key, len(v)))
  26         if timeout:
  27             self.client.setex(key, int(timeout), v)
  28         else:
  29             self.client.set(key, v)
  30 
  31     def delete(self, key, version=None):
  32         key = self.make_key(key, version=version)
  33         self.client.delete(key)
  34 
  35     def get(self, key, version=None, raw=False):
  36         key = self.make_key(key, version=version)
  37         result = self.client.get(key)
  38         if result is not None and not raw:
  39             result = json.loads(result)
  40         return result
  41 
  42 
  43 class RbCache(CommonRedisCache):
  44     def __init__(self, **options):
  45         cluster, options = get_cluster_from_options("SENTRY_CACHE_OPTIONS", options)
  46         client = cluster.get_routing_client()
  47         CommonRedisCache.__init__(self, client, **options)
  48 
  49 
  50 # Confusing legacy name for RbCache.  We don't actually have a pure redis cache
  51 RedisCache = RbCache
  52 
  53 
  54 class RedisClusterCache(CommonRedisCache):
  55     def __init__(self, cluster_id, **options):
  56         client = redis_clusters.get(cluster_id)
  57         CommonRedisCache.__init__(self, client=client, **options)
